nl: Prove that characteristic subgroups are normal.
lean:
∀ {G : Type*} [Group G] (H : Subgroup G)
  [Characteristic H], Normal H
candidate: ∀ {G : Type*} [Group G] (H : Subgroup G), Characteristic H → Normal H
imports:
import Mathlib

open Fintype Subgroup Set Polynomial Ideal
